chambers.name: Chambers
chambers.desc: Some chambers for your cultists to sleep in.

tunnel.name: Tunnel
tunnel.desc: Adding an extra tunnel will make mining more productive
tunnel.effectDesc: +10% output on all cultists in the mines

prospector.name: Prospector
prospector.desc: Prospect for new metals in your mineshaft
prospector.effectDesc: Unlock the next tier of metal
